section.section: The Advisory Council consists of 7 members.
The Secretary shall appoint the members from a list submitted to the Secretary by:
The number of names on the list shall be 3 times the number of vacancies.

text.section: Each member shall be an individual with demonstrated scientific and technical expertise in the field of toxicology, epidemiology, or occupational medicine.

section.section: The term of a member is 5 years.
The terms of members are staggered as required by the terms provided for members of the Council on July 1, 1988.
At the end of a term, a member continues to serve until a successor is appointed and qualifies.
A member who is appointed after a term has begun serves only for the rest of the term and until a successor is appointed and qualifies.

text.section: The Secretary may remove a member for incompetence or misconduct.
